title: Exceeded my expectations
body: After searching for a while for a reliable app that I can use to record both my blood pressure and glucose level, I decided to try this one out. After 3 days of using and testing it, I was so amazed at the marvelous graphs, presentations and reporting details that I decided to go for a 6 months premium membership. I am very pleased with this app. It has truly exceeded my expectations. Very professional and well designed product indeed!

title: Great tool
body: Recently I had a visit to my doctor that suggested I needed to monitor my blood pressure my weight and my glucose levels having never done that before I was a little low on sure as to how to proceed. This particular app does it well does it simply and gives me all the information I need to give to my doctor

title: Finally - an app that tracks it all!
body: I have been tracking blood sugars, food, weight, exercise, etc. all manually and in different apps. This app does it all now with the exception of it not syncing with my smart watch. It’s super simple to use, the layout isn’t too feature heavy and I can easily share data with others (apparently there’s a limit to how many times I can share with the free version). Customer service is non-existent and offers no support when needed, and is why I’m not giving this the full 5 stars.

title: Easy and intuitive!
body: Have used several apps for tracking my Glucose and Blood Pressure! With automatic Bluetooth sync and easy notes, this is far and away the best that I’ve tried. Love the pdf reports as well for the trips to my doctor! Bought the 6 month and will renew each time!

title: New user
body: I am new to this device and app but from what I can see it covers all my recording needs. This eliminates me using two apps for recording information. I enjoy using this app which allows me to sync up with my laptop to send information to my doctor.

title: Very disappointed - OK Now
body: I’m wondering how this app got such a high rating. I can not complete the setup on an iPhone 11. No keyboard comes up in the Personalization section. There appears to be no way email them on their website - the Submit button never activates.

title: Easiest app out there!
body: This is by far the best BG app I’ve found.  I’ve installed and looked at 9 others and Health2Sync is like taking my favorite parts of each and rolling them all together.  Reports are easy to send. Input is a breeze, and it even syncs to my meter via Bluetooth.

title: Love this app!
body: I have type 1 diabetes and this is the first app that is easy to use and gives me the information I need in a simple format. Plus I love that I can enter my sugars in myself, rather than syncing with the monitor. This is truly a life saver for me!

title: Bad form to gut your free version in order to force subscription purchase
body: I see that you have crippled your reporting function With the creation of your premium subscription. I will be leaving and I’ll be taking all of my diabetic family members with me into another application. It’s not OK to cripple the free version that people are using. I’d have been happy to pay for the premium version with added features had you not done so.

title: Terms of use agreement
body: After downloading this app I plowed through the terms of use agreement. After 15 minutes of reading, I finally came to the hold harmless, indemnification clause.

title: Love the app
body: I love the app, but won’t pay a monthly fee for it. Out of all the paid services, the only one I would use is pdf print. Maybe come up with a separate one time fee to add that feature.

title: Access as doctor
body: I just write an email to control my patients on the web interface but received no answer... some email which we can write to have answer?

title: Great device!
body: Syncs with meter so all readings show up dated and with notes!  Awesome device to keep track of everything easily.

title: Easy to use
body: This is the best way that I have found to track blood glucose.

title: Health 2 sync
body: Just started using app. So far I really like it.  Haven’t tried everything yet

title: User Name and Password Issues
body: My wife recently changed phones and had to download the app again.  She forgot her password.  Have tried to request reset link from developer 3 times and have not gotten a response.  Why can I not get someone to send me the reset link?  Very frustrating.

title: Wow
body: I am so glad I stumbled upon this app!  It is by far the best app I’ve used to track BG.  It is very stable and response is quick.  Syncs well with my meter.  I love that I can track other data as well and the trends and graphs are just what I needed!

title: Great app
body: Been using for 2 months now and it was very easy and intuitive to get started and use. Very easy to input data and not overly complicated. I would highly recommend!

title: One stop shop.
body: I love that I can track EVERYTHING on one app.  I haven’t tried the reports yet, but I’m confident that they will be great by the way the app is easy to use.  Thank You.  Brenda

title: Confusing
body: I am finding this app a little confusing.  Like meds.  I take a lot of meds.  Do you want all my meds or just my diabetes med, that is not clear. I also cannot find some of them.  I just feel like I am flying blind on how to use this app.

title: Food
body: I can not locate space to record what food I ate the night before.  App seems easy to navigate!

title: Great app
body: When my daughter showed me how to use it, it’s been great, use it every day

title: Health2Sync
body: I like the app and it tracks everything I want. I’ve had a little trouble learning to use it but I think that’s me.

title: Good way to control weight and glucose
body: I find that by recording my daily activity I watch my caloric and sugar intake and as a result I’ve lost 7 pounds and lowered my average glucose count.

title: Diabetes. Control
body: Helps me have trusted numbers for diabetes control

title: Easy to use
body: Needed something to track my bg and this is perfect.

title: Best app out there
body: Best out there even my doctor wants to use it for his other patients

title: Download data
body: Should be able to download data without a monthly charge, maybe a one time fee. Otherwise I like the app.

title: Broke an excellent app!
body: This used to be a great app, but they added so much complexity in clicking through screens to just add a reading! The latest version requires multiple screen clicks to just add a reading! Bring back the previous version! It worked great!

title: Spammy Notifications
body: I made the mistake of allowing notifications for this app. Now the app is spamming me with promotional notifications.

title: Blood test results
body: I like the simplicity and thoroughness of this app.

title: Great App
body: Awesome app!   Straightforward and extremely easy to use!

title: Great App
body: Great app for tracking blood pressure and glucose. Also syncs with health app on iPhone.

title: Awesome App
body: Awesome app. Could add heart rate instead of blood pressure.

title: Second mother
body: Good group like a 24 hrs 7day mom lol

title: No units for medication
body: Does not have a way to enter units of insulin. So the medication portion is not useful at all for insulin dependent type 1.

title: Health2Sync
body: Very easy to use

title: Perfect Blood Glucose Monitoring app
body: This is a perfect app for monitoring blood glucose and keeping the track of it.

title: Excellent so far
body: I like the way I can download to an Excel spreadsheet and fax to my GP

title: Ray Lew
body: Only app I use to track Blood Glucose. My Doctor like the 90 day averages.

title: Great app
body: I have been testing a few apps over the past year, not sure how I missed this app. So far, it beats the other apps.

title: Seems decent!
body: Just grabbed this and trying it out. My doctor wants me to keep a log for a week or so with my fingersticks but also what I eat and my mood and so on. It seems to have all I need fir that. Plus I can email her a PDF of my progress and notes! Looks like a perfect app for what I was tasked to do!

title: Best app
body: This is all In one app that helps trade weight vitals and your blood sugar after a loved one had triple bypass and had diabetes and I had to do round clock checks  I could print out the pdf from email and give to all doctors they loved the data keeping made there job easier so yes this app is the best app out there....... Thanks health2sync

title: Tracking Weight, Glucose and BP
body: It's important to use something like this app to track your blood pressure wait in glucose. Since this did all 3+ let you add the medications that you check the type of food that you ate and additional notes as necessary;  This application has been very helpful in doing so.

title: Love love love this app!!!!
body: This app has all the simple, yet powerful features for anyone to record their daily meals & glucose levels! It has a diary option that you can log your meals with pictures which I truly love!!

title: Health2Syn
body: Good app. Easy to use.

title: Awesome app
body: Great product

title: Very helpful
body: Very impressed

title: 智抗糖
body: 很窩心！

title: Great app
body: Works great so far.

title: Seems like a great app!
body: Just learning to deal with hypoglycemia, this app allows me to customize my day, keep accurate records, and most of all.. Allow my husband to know what's going on via his phone.

title: Great app!
body: I have used this app since I was diagnosed with gestational diabetes. I like how easy to use and that I can email the reports for my doctor to see!

title: Really helpful
body: My 12 year old daughter has been showing signs of Type 1 Diabetes. This is making it very easy to track her results.

title: Comprehensive
body: Recently diagnosed with diastolic heart failure. I needed management across a wider spectrum! Blood pressure, weight, activity, food and blood glucose. This app has all that and more. I love the photo diary element! Great design thinking!

title: Wasn't crazy about it
body: You can easily dismiss the notifications if you need to open your phone for another purpose, so it can be kinda useless in terms of providing a reminder to check. It's also confusing to set which times you measure your blood sugar.

title: Stan
body: This site helps to inform me how my diet effects my BG & BP. I've made it part of my routine to test twice per day and enter results quickly without writing. I'm planning to sync my meter when I purchase the cable. Try it, it is FREE, help yourself & your doctor. Entry of results is easy.

title: Finally found the one!
body: So glad to find an easy to use quality product, I'm a believer!  If the developers add features for a small fee, I'm actually willing to pay.  That's a rarity as I've only purchased 3 apps in the last 15 years and only use one of them to date.

title: Does what you need
body: This does weight. Glucose. Blood pressure.  And suns with apple iPhone health. There is a good. Daily goal. Meter sync. A journal. You can export. This has all you need. I have been looking for something like this.  It's free. Definitely check it out

title: Love it!
body: Great to help you keep track of blood pressure, blood sugar, weight, meds, eating habits and exercise. And you can even print it out email to your doctor or whoever! Amazing little app!

title: Good app for diabetes and BP mgmt
body: Features that set this app apart from similar ones:

title: The Best
body: I am so excited about this app, I have already recommended it to all families and friends.

title: App review
body: It's a great app for getting you leveled with your numbers..

title: The best
body: Love this app!! Gives feedback and suggestions on what to do as it keeps track of your blood sugar trends. Very impressed!! Thank you!!

title: Good
body: Basic but gets the job done

title: Forced to “Sign up"
body: Couldn’t get into the app because it tries to force you to give up your email up front,  waste of money for the cable.

title: This app is awesome
body: Exactly what I needed to track my readings without a bunch of needless clutter.  Able to send pdf summary reports and share results. I use it for bp, glucose & weight.

title: Very
body: Easy to use

title: Awesome
body: I love it! Just wish it had a headache category in the how you feel section

title: Great app!
body: Love this app! Have only had it for s few days, but it's very user friendly and I like that I can record BP and BS so easily. My doc is gonna love me....

title: Nice app
body: Basic graphical app. Easy to use and I like the PDF generation option for sending to healthcare providers

title: Awesome
body: Love this app!! Very helpful..,

title: Lee lecturas pero no aparecen en la aplicacion
body: Al principio todo bien pero ahora hace la lectura pero no me deja verla

title: Ronald Evers
body: Love this appt

title: 非常好用與實用！
body: 對糖友而言非常好用與實用！希望百尺竿頭更進一步！

title: 非常好用
body: 推薦給所有有需要的朋友
